chapters.title: Chapter 13: The Bowl of the Winds
chapters.info: Vandene Namelle, p. 256 (373)—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah, one of two Aes Sedai who went into voluntary retreat many years ago to Tifan's Well, a village located in the grassy plains of Arafel along with her sister Adeleas. Their goal was some day to write the complete history of the World since the Breaking, and some even before that. Vandene and Adeleas have since come to Salidar to escape Elaida's summons back to the Tower. See also Namelle, Adeleas.
